I am Alex

a creative designer ready for a challenge.

I help build meaningful brands through design.
My goal is to create meaningful, timeless graphics and web experiences.

Graphic Design

Create eye-catching visuals that leave an impression with your brand and your message. I do everything from logo and brand development to poster design.

Web Design

Design beautiful and functional web experiences tailored to your brand. From wireframes to pixel perfect mockups, I’ve got you covered.

Web Development

I build custom coded websites and can work with CMS’s such as Wordpress or static site generators. With knowledge of HTML, CSS and Javascript I make sure everything looks and works just right.
